private_information: Can only interact with blocks labeled with vowels (A, O).
Agent 1.goal: Reconfigure blocks A and O to achieve the goal configuration.

private_information: Can only interact with blocks labeled with consonants (B, C).
Agent 2.goal: Reconfigure blocks B and C to achieve the goal configuration.

public_information: Both agents can only manipulate the top block of any stack.
Each agent can only move one block at a time.

Agent 1.system_prompt: Reconfigure blocks A and O according to the goal.
Agent 1.prompt: Move blocks A and O to achieve the goal configuration.

Agent 2.system_prompt: Reconfigure blocks B and C according to the goal.
Agent 2.prompt: Move blocks B and C to achieve the goal configuration.

constraints: Agent 1 Manipulate Vowel Blocks->Agent 2 Manipulate Consonant Blocks
